DOC.brief_summary: Study determine bronchodilatory effect PF-04191834 compare zileuton patient asthma
DOC.brief_title: PF-04191834 Single Dose Bronchodilatory Study In Asthma .
DOC.criteria: Persistent mild/moderate asthma least 6 month . Reduced lung function Reversible airway obstruction Pregnant/nursing female . Liver function test great upper limit normal ( ULN )
